DYWX-TV (1978-1986) | effective_radiated_power = 15.0000 [[Watt]]s | homepage = [http://www.ptni.tv/ People's Television Network] }} '''DYPT-TV''', channel 11, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[People's Television Network]]. Its studio is located in Subangdaku, [[Mandaue City]], while its transmitter is located at AC Cortes Avenue, [[Cebu City]]. ==See also== *[[People's Television Network]] {{Philippines-tv-stub}} {{Metro Cebu TV}} [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1978]] [[Category:Television in Cebu City]] [[Category:NBN stations]] [[ceb:DYNL-TV]] [[tl:DYPT-TV]]
